snippet: Federal regulators are under pressure to rein in a multi-billion dollar consulting industry after the firms stumbled during a recent review of foreclosure abuses. But the efforts could be stymied, given regulators’ cozy ties to consultants and...
lead_paragraph: Federal regulators are under pressure to rein in a multi-billion dollar consulting industry after the firms stumbled during a recent review of foreclosure abuses. But the efforts could be stymied, given regulators’ cozy ties to consultants and limited legal authority to penalize them.
